definition.name: Enable Pull Request Automerge
definition.description: A GitHub action to enable auto-merge on a pull request
definition.author: peter-evans

inputs.name: token
inputs.description: GITHUB_TOKEN or a `repo` scoped Personal Access Token (PAT)

inputs.name: repository
inputs.description: The target GitHub repository containing the pull request

inputs.name: pull-request-number
inputs.description: The number of the target pull request

inputs.name: merge-method
inputs.description: The merge method to use. `merge`, `rebase` or `squash`.
